database.title: Database Management
database.testDataWarning: This operation will delete all existing data in the database and replace it with test data
database.backupDescription: Export the database as an SQL file for backup or import an SQL file to restore the database.
database.dataOnlyTooltip: Export only data without the database structure
database.preserveSchemaTooltip: Keeps the current database structure and only updates the data
database.exportStarted: {exportType} database export started. Download should begin shortly.
database.confirmImportPreserveSchema: Are you sure you want to import this SQL file? Existing data will be updated while preserving the current database structure.
database.confirmImportOverwrite: Are you sure you want to import this SQL file? All existing data and structure will be overwritten.
database.resetWarningFull: Resets the database to its initial state, deleting all existing data. Warning: This operation is irreversible.
database.testDataWarningFull: This function initializes the database with test data to facilitate application development and testing. Warning: This operation will delete all existing data in the database and replace it with test data.
database.supplierNames: Wood Supplier, Metal Supplier, Fabric Supplier
database.materialNames: Oak Wood, Stainless Steel, Cotton Fabric
database.confirmInitTestData: Are you sure you want to initialize the database with test data? All existing data will be deleted.
database.initSuccess: Initialization completed successfully! Created: {suppliers} suppliers, {materials} materials, {components} components, {models} models, and {inventoryItems} inventory items.

aboutApp.title: About This Application
aboutApp.description: Craft Inventory is a comprehensive management system designed to help you organize and track your materials, components, finished products, suppliers, customers, and transactions. Perfect for crafters, makers, and small businesses.

whatIs.title: What is Kiosk Mode?
whatIs.description: Kiosk Mode provides a safe demonstration environment where you can explore all features without worrying about permanent changes to the data.

autoReset.title: Automatic Reset
autoReset.description: All data is automatically restored to default demo values every 15 minutes, ensuring a fresh experience for every user.

freshData.title: Fresh Demo Data
freshData.description: Start with sample materials, components, and products that showcase the application's capabilities.

safeDemo.title: Safe Exploration
safeDemo.description: Try adding, editing, or deleting items without any permanent consequences - everything resets automatically.

demo.title: Demo Environment Notice
demo.isDemo: This is a demonstration version of the application
demo.noGuarantee: No guarantee on the functioning or availability of this demo
demo.canChange: Demo features and data may change in the future
demo.dontStress: Please don't stress the application with excessive requests

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Ready to explore? Start by checking out our sample data or try adding your own items. Remember, everything resets automatically in kiosk mode!
